snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include an examination of ways Elon Musk’s proposed Hyperloop could get people to San Francisco from Los Angeles in 30...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include an examination of ways Elon Musk’s proposed Hyperloop could get people to San Francisco from Los Angeles in 30 minutes, and reactions to revelations about government surveillance of phone records and the Internet.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Hyperloop Theories and N.S.A. Surveillance
